combinatorial

Class Permutation

  • java.lang.Object
    • combinatorial.Permutation

  • public class Permutation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements some basic permutation-related operations.

    • Method Detail

      • isIdentity

        public static boolean isIdentity(int[] perm)
        Tests to see if the permutation is an identity map.
        Parameters:
        perm - Integer array representing the permutation.
        Returns:
        True if for all i, perm[i]==i. False otherwise.

      • obtainRandomPermutation

        public static int[] obtainRandomPermutation(int len)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Generates a random permutation.
        Parameters:
        len - Length of the desired permutation.
        Returns:
        Integer array that is a random permutation of numbers 0..len-1
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        Permutes the rows of a square matrix.
        Parameters:
        matrix - Float 2D array that is the square matrix.
        perm - Permutation to apply.

        Checks if a permutation has an even number of transpositions.

        Returns:
